name: Bad Water
description:
You play as a water creature, and slowly dive deep to save yourself from toxic pollution.

Every move make you weaker, and wings smaller. Eat to recover “wings”.
Beware this dark blobs.

Controls:

This game is made with gamepad sticks control in mind
However you can play with mouse, but its not as cool as on a gamepad.

Known issues:
No sound
